summary:
- A Player home near Whiterun with merchant, mannequins, weapon racks, crafting stations and Dragon Priest mask alter
- 2 all new quests Including 4 new dungeons and a new worldspace. 
- 3 new perks and 3 new spells to make spell and one handed more viable
descriptionHtml:
Battlemage Keep 2.0
-----------
Features
-----------
- 2 all new quests Including 4 new dungeons and a new worldspace. 
  An obsession for ancient armour has already consumed the life of one man. Can you complete his quest?
  Something old has been awoken. Can you survive the challenge of the ancient Wraith?
- A Player home near Whiterun with merchant, mannequins, weapon racks, crafting stations and Dragon Priest mask alter
- 3 new perks and 3 new spells to make spell and one handed more viable
- Around 2 hours of new content
- Featuring the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10864] Warmage Armour [/url] from the fantastic Doodaboom
  Check out his other armours here! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/993074] Doodaboom Awesome Armours [/url]

Perks-
Battlemage Proficiency - One-handed tree, 3 points, Total 20% melee damage and 20% spell effectiveness when one-handed and spell equipped.

Battlemage Aptitude - Destruction tree, 3 points, Total 20% melee damage and 20% spell effectiveness when one-handed and spell equipped.

Battlemage Fortitude - Heavy tree, 3 points, 60% magicka regeneration when wearing 4 pieces of heavy armour.

Spells-
Battlemage Blast- Chain lightning with fire damage over time, left hand only

Battlemage Fury - A jet of steam burning for fire damage over time (can be used with melee attack), left hand only.

Battlemage Spear- Icy spear with blood freezing poison damage over time, left hand only

----------------
Compatibility
----------------
Incompatible with any mods which use the vanilla courier or make changes to the Destruction, Heavy or One-handed perk tree

----------------
FAQ
----------------
Q. Is this a house or a quest?
A. It is both, however the key for the house is given at the beginning of the quest so completing it is not required.

Q. How can i have my spouse move into the house?
A. While an other mod friendly way to use the spouse dialogue isn\'t possible at this time, some clever folks have found away to do it via spells.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370] Spouses Can Live Everywhere [/url]

Visit any major city after completing the High Hrothgar main quest and the courier will talk to you, beginning the first quest. Speak to Sondill for part 2.
Recommend level 20+, Higher than average difficulty. Must have subtitles turned on to see the dialogue.

------------
1.1 Notes
------------

Sleeping in the keep will now give the \"Well Rested\" bonus.
Cleaned up the entrance to Korall Grotto
Moved the fast travel point closer to the keep
When fast traveling, your horse will now spawn at the keep entrance steps if you travel dismounted
The quest \"The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller\" will no longer point to Korall Grotto

------------
2.0 Notes
------------
Added a new quest with new dungeons, NPC\'s and rewards tailored for the Battlemage role
Added a new charge up sound for Battlemage Blast to sync the charge time and audio
Cleaned up some seams in Korall Grotto
Switched the gate activation order in Hidar\'s tomb to make it clearer when you enter the correct sequence

------------
2.1 Notes
------------
Fix for floating fauna, furniture and floor
author: Mrfixit84
